subject: TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: kolrone
full_text:
I tried sending this yesterday (Friday), but I guess it didn't go through. "I know how some people feel about the TAPS guys, but is anyone going to TAPSCON ( http://tapscon.com/)in Clearwater, Florida this weekend? I can't make it on Saturday, since I have to work, but I'm thinking about going on Sunday. If you go to the site it has a live feed (which I plan to watch at work)and its venue, etc. There's going to be all kinds of different stuff, but I don't know if it's worth the money. I think it'd be interesting to go though."
 
-Aaron
